Text:
lol why is the movie soooo short,...?
Is it a movie or a making of,...?

This was a completely fan made film, meant to pay tribute to the books and films (as well as, i'm sure, show off the directing/effects/and acting talents of those involved). It's entertaining, very much in the spirit of LOTR...and also available to watch in HD at http://www.thehuntforgollum.com/

Why anyone would put it here >.> when you can watch it there, I can't figure out.
